info.title: Access Risk Management Provisioning Services Web APIs

get.summary: Gets a list of provisioning request for the specified system.
Exports a list of provisioning request as an Excel file.
Gets a provisioning request for the specified id.

post.summary: Creates a new user provisioning request. Returns the unique identifier of the new request.
Creates an existing user provisioning request. Returns the unique identifier of the new request.
Creates a new user provisioning request. Returns the unique identifier of the new request.
Approve the request if exist bypassing the approval validations
Verifies if provided ERP System belongs to the Customer.
Verifies if user with provided Username belongs to the Customer.

ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.M.description: Represents the model for an automated provisioning request.

id.description: The unique identifier of the request.

displayId.description: Represents a friendly version of the id for display purposes.

accountId.description: The id of the parent account.

erpSystemId.description: The id of the parent ERP system.

securityExtractId.description: The id of the security extract used in the request.

state.description:
The current state of the request.
One of the ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.Enums.AutomatedProvisioningState elements.

results.description: Represents the current results of the request.

requestedFor.description: Represents the username of the user the request is for.

requestedBy.description: Represents the username of the user who performed the request.

requestDate.description: Represents the date and time the request was made.

completionDate.description: Represents the date and time the request was completed.

enableManagerApprovals.description: Represents if Manager Approvals are enabled.

approvers.description: Represents a collection of approvers for the request.

actions.description:
Represents the available actions for the request based on ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.Models.AutomatedProvisioningRequestModel.RequestState
and user permissions. One of the ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.Enums.AutomatedProvisioningActions elements.

activityHistory.description: Represents the activity history for the request.

roleChanges.description: Represents a collection of role changes for the request.

comment.description: Represents the comments of the request.

provisionPartialRoles.description: Determines if request could be provisioned even if some of its roles have been rejected.

cloneRolesFromUser.description: ERP user name to clone roles from

ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.M.description: Represents the model for an EAM user.
Represents the model of a role change.

id.description: The unique identifier of the role.

description.description: Represents the description of the role changed.

validFrom.description: The start date of the validity of the role.

validTo.description: The end date of the validity of the role.

ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.M.description: Represents the model for a SAP user.

username.description: Represents the id of the user.

validFrom.description: Represents the date from which the user is valid.

validTo.description: Represents the date to which the user is valid.

ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.M.description: Represents the model for a new user provisioning request.

accountId.description: Represents the id of the account under which the provisioning was requested.

erpSystemId.description: Represents the id of the ERP system.

roleChanges.description: Represents a collection of role changes to check for conflicts.

provisionPartialRoles.description: Determines if request could be provisioned even if some of its roles have been rejected.

cloneRolesFromUser.description: ERP user name to clone roles from

ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.M.description: Represents the model of an existing user provisioning request.

username.description: Represents the username of the existing user.

enableManagerApprovals.description: Represents a value indicating whether to enable manager approvals.

accountId.description: Represents the id of the account under which the provisioning was requested.

erpSystemId.description: Represents the id of the ERP system.

roleChanges.description: Represents a collection of role changes to check for conflicts.

provisionPartialRoles.description: Determines if request could be provisioned even if some of its roles have been rejected.

cloneRolesFromUser.description: ERP user name to clone roles from

ErpMaestro.ProvisioningServices.Common.M.description: Represents the model for an automated provisioning action request.

requestId.description: Represents the id of the automated provisioning request.

comment.description: Represents the comments for the specified request action.
